product_name: Trigger Point Performance GRID X Foam Roller
long_description: Twice as firm as the original GRID, the GRID X foam roller aerates muscle tissue while you roll, promoting the flow of blood and oxygen for effective muscle repair assistance after tough workouts.
short_description: Twice as firm as the original GRID, the GRID X foam roller aerates muscle tissue while you roll, promoting the flow of blood and oxygen for effective muscle repair assistance after tough workouts.
